name.ja: <ruby>冥<rt>めい</rt></ruby><ruby>跡<rt>せき</rt></ruby>のカーディー

summoning_condition.en: If you have "Gunde of the Monumenthes" or "Yorishiro of Isyria" face-up on your field, you can Special Summon this card from your hand to your field in face-up Defense Position.

requirement.en: During your Main Phase that you Normal or Special Summoned this card, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: During your opponent's next turn, your opponent can only declare up to 2 attacks. Then, you can shuffle 3 Beast-Warrior Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.
